"A Lord Elder, hmmm?" Tryin=
g to recall if possible a Lord Elder and yet, she could not recall such a n=
ame mentioned in her presense. But the prospect of protecting what the Dece=
pticons held currently in this timeframe and hopefully protecting those Dec=
epticons of the future... she was all for it. 

"Let us not waste precious =
time then," she stated gently in that sultry malicious trademark tone of he=
rs. 

She was eager to put this new body to the test. And... eager to see w=
hat her new companion was capable of doing. After all, the Decepticon cause=
 now lay in the balance of their hand servos.
